menu_heisters_never_die_desc:
BASIC: ##$basic##
When you revive someone using inspire, you will revive everyone around him in a ##50## meters radius 

ACE: ##$pro##
Increases the bonus to ##100## meters
menu_dodge_T5_boost_desc:
BASIC: ##$basic##
Everytime you dodge you restore ##25%## stamina and ##20%## armor

ACE: ##$pro##
Increase the stamina bonus to ##40%## and the armor bonus to ##50%##
